page.title: 20HOW THIS PROJECT WAS MADE
page.content: Classes one and two of{Great Oakley {Primary School}made this project in the Summer of 1985.We visited {Dengewell Hall}and{Thompsons Farms.}We were told about the dairy herd at {Higher Barn Farm}and then walked back to school through Gravel Wood.The bluebells were out and looked beautiful. The Rev.L. De Groose told us all about the{Church.}Mr Betts came to talk about{Chartercoach},Lady Hoskyns talked about{health}and Mrs De Groose, Oakstones and W.I.In our folders we have got writing, painting, maps and charts. One map is about bus routes going through Great Oakley another map is of Dengewell Hall Farm. My favourite piece of work is my painting of the school.My folder is covered by a pattern of pigs made by a 3 coloured lino cut.
